PATIENT_ID: TEST_NEUROSURG_NC_001
ARRIVAL_TIME: 2026-02-27 02:00:00

[TRAUMA_HP] 2026-02-27 02:10:00
Category I activation for 55-year-old male. Assault with bat.
Head injury sustained. Traumatic brain injury suspected. TBI.
GCS: 8. Intubated for airway protection.
BP 168/98, HR 58, neurologic examination shows fixed left pupil.
Focal neurologic deficit documented.

[IMAGING] 2026-02-27 02:30:00
CT head: acute right subdural hematoma with 10 mm midline shift.
Intracranial pathology confirmed. Brain CT documented.
Epidural hematoma component also identified.

[PHYSICIAN_NOTE] 2026-02-27 03:00:00
Severe TBI with intracranial mass lesion. GCS 8.
No neurosurgical consult obtained.
Neurosurgery consultation not requested despite qualifying criteria.
No neurosurgical evaluation obtained.
Patient managed expectantly without neurosurgery involvement.
